item.title: Babel Badger
item.description: A telegram bot that translates messages using ChatGPT.

item.title: Jira Connector for Google Data Studio
item.description: This community connector enables Google Data Studio to crunch Kanban-type statistics like lead time directly from Jira’s API.

item.title: Travel Map
item.description: A satellite photo of the world overlaid with pins for places I’ve been. Open source and easily forkable!

item.title: Wonderful World
item.description: A curated list of cool travel destinations for sight-seeing.
